name: Elder's Tale
description:
Welcome to the mysterious world of "Elder's Tale"! A fantastical strategy game who's mystery is only surpassed by it's raw entertainment value. Play as one of three factions as you work to save the world from Susie and her hoard of monsters. Enjoy cute dialog and hours of entertainment in fantastical worlds on this 100% free mobile compatible game. If you enjoyed your experience, don't forget to rate us in the app store!

This game is being used as a litmus test for community support. Black Sheep Games is proud to release every game we develop as 100% free and open to community suggestion. Check out our patreon page!
